stories.original_headline: Scientists found a way to help aging guts heal themselves
stories.original_summary: Researchers have discovered a way to help aging intestines heal themselves using CAR T-cell therapy. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potion to Mend Old Guts and Boost Vitality!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has concocted a wondrous new potion! This magical brew can help the inner workings of older folk mend themselves. It targets a peculiar blight that builds up over time, allowing the body to heal, reduce fiery aches, and better absorb vital nutrients.

stories.original_headline: This ancient fossil could rewrite the story of human origins
stories.original_summary: Scientists may have cracked the case of whether a seven-million-year-old fossil could walk upright. stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Bone Relic May Uncover Secrets of Humankind's First Steps!
stories.fantasy_story: Scholars of ancient lore have unearthed a grand secret from a seven-million-year-old bone relic. It seems this ancient creature, despite its beast-like appearance, walked upright on two legs like the early folk. This discovery could rewrite the scrolls detailing the true origins of our kind.
